entry.title: The need for larger blocks
entry.summary: The conversation revolves around the controversial idea of a hard fork and whether or not n-1 developers disagreeing with it would make it controversial. NxtChg responds by stating that assuming all developers represent the entire community is not realistic and there could be shady lobbying happening behind the scenes. Greg acknowledges this point and notes that setting the bar for perfect representation of the community is a strange one, as it would mean nothing can be controversial if a different group disagrees.
